xwikidoc.name: BlogEditArticle
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.adminPolx
xwikidoc.content: #** * Blog Create or Edit Article Code * **# #** * My Curriki Blog Page Content Callback * * @param $userdoc User document to display the form for * @param $userobj User object to display the form for * @author dward@curriki.org *# #macro(mycurriki_pagecontent $userdoc $userobj) ## { #blog_editarticle(1) #end ## } ## ## Actual Page Display #if($request.page) ## This is the save part #blog_savearticle() #else #if($doc.web.startsWith("Blog_") || ("$!request.editArticle" != "" && $request.editArticle.startsWith("Blog_")) || ("$!request.space" != "" && $request.space.startsWith("Blog_"))) ## { #mycurriki_page('blog') #else ## } { #blog_editarticle(0) #end ## } #end
